## Table Generator

[This website](https://tablesgenerator.com/markdown_tables) helps you generate tables in different coding languages including LaTeX, HTML, Text, Markdown, and MediaWiki. For example, you can copy and paste table content from a word doc and it will generate the code result that you can copy into your R markdown or Quarto document
